verses.verse: A Psalm of Asaph. God <S%H430><s%> standeth <S%H5324><s%> in the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>; He judgeth <S%H8199><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%>.
How long will ye judge <S%H8199><s%> unjustly <S%H5766><s%>, And respect <S%H5375><s%> the persons <S%H6440><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>? Selah <S%H5542><s%>
Judge <S%H8199><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> and fatherless <S%H3490><s%>: Do justice <S%H6663><s%> to the afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and destitute <S%H7326><s%>.
Rescue <S%H6403><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>: Deliver <S%H6403><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>.

They know <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H995><s%>, neither do they understand; They walk <S%H1980><s%> to and fro in darkness <S%H2825><s%>: All the foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> are shaken <S%H4131><s%>.
I said <S%H559><s%>, Ye are gods <S%H430><s%>, And all of you sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Most High <S%H5945><s%>.
Nevertheless <S%H403><s%> ye shall die <S%H4191><s%> like men <S%H120><s%>, And fall <S%H5307><s%> like one <S%H259><s%> of the princes <S%H8269><s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, judge <S%H8199><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>; For thou shalt inherit <S%H5157><s%> all the nations <S%H1471><s%>.
